title: Projects!
text:
Personal Hydration Data
The last three years I have noticed that I liked the water at my workplace at lot more than other water available to me which led me to track my intake in ounces for this study! Every day for the past few weeks I have collected the amount of water consumed throughout the day based on the primary independent variable of whether or not I worked.




















work_daymean_intakeno60.5625yes71.7000

title: Daniela Lopez Maria
text: Hi! Iâ€™m Daniela Lopez, a third year Environmental Studies major (BS) with a minor in Earth Science at the University of California, Santa Barbara! I enjoy any outdoor activities, hanging out with friends, and cooking/baking!

title: My Resume
text: This will be my resume area. Either attach a PDF with a full description or interactive version of resume with links to specific achievements/job

title: Cooking with Me (Dani!)
text: I have always loved cooking but recently got into using sourdough starter after I was able to get a free one from the farmers market. I love making traditional food to make me feel at home but I also love expanding and learning new recipes.

title: About Me!
text:
Childhood
Hi my name is Daniela Lopez! I was born in Colima, Mexico but left to Tijuana where I lived up until I was about 8. Almost all of my cherished memories from Mexico had been of me playing outside or even just walking to school stopping by fruit trees and eating something really fast. Ever since I was little I had a deep love for the Earth but never knew I could pursue that as a career.



Now
Now I spend my days mostly studying at the library preparing to protect nature! my friends and I love going on small adventures whether that is going on small hikes or just taking walks near the beach! I also love the occasional Victory Royale on Fortnite!
